title: Quick Tab sync bugs fixed in v1.6.0.12
details:
Fixed three critical Quick Tab synchronization bugs in v1.6.0.12:

1. **Storage Quota Errors (Issues #35, #51)**: 
   - Root Cause: Extension using browser.storage.sync with 100KB limit, causing QuotaExceededError
   - Solution: Switched to browser.storage.local (much higher limits) in 15+ locations
   - Files: SyncStorageAdapter.js, StorageManager.js, QuickTabHandler.js, background.js
   - Impact: Quick Tabs can now be saved without quota errors

2. **Panel Manager Double-Toggle (Ctrl+Alt+Z broken)**:
   - Root Cause: Two message listeners both responding to TOGGLE_QUICK_TABS_PANEL (content.js and panel.js)
   - Solution: Removed duplicate listener in panel.js setupMessageListener()
   - Impact: Ctrl+Alt+Z keyboard shortcut now works correctly

3. **Z-Index Not Syncing Across Tabs**:
   - Root Cause: Z-index only updated in UI (QuickTabWindow), not saved to domain entity or storage
   - Solution: Modified VisibilityHandler.handleFocus() to send UPDATE_QUICK_TAB_ZINDEX message to background
   - Added handleZIndexUpdate() in QuickTabHandler and registered in MessageRouter
   - Impact: Quick Tabs maintain proper stacking order when switching tabs

All fixes maintain backward compatibility and follow the domain-driven architecture pattern.
